tossup_question: -   –    Which of the following air masses is the densest?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Continental tropical
X) Continental polar
Y) Maritime tropical
Z) Maritime polar
bonus_question: -  19)  – 	When is a strong temperature inversion most likely to form?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) On a warm, windy night
X) On a cool, windy night
Y) On a rainy night with light winds
Z) On a clear night with light winds
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Z) ON A CLEAR NIGHT WITH LIGHT WINDS
